title: My ELO is Bugged...
body: For some reason my LP is stuck at 49. i have never has somthing like this happen before and i really need help thanks.

replies.body: So you aren't seeing a change in your LP after winning or losing a match? Can you give your client a quick reboot and check if this still happens?
i havant seen anything like this before.

Yeah, I've never heard of anything like this before either. Can you try playing a ranked match from **both** the Beta Client *and* Legacy Client? You can access the legacy from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this happens in both clients.
i think it fixed itself cuz i just lost lp rip
